Package org.buildmlearn.appstore.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppDetails
    This class deals with the App-Details page, which is shown when the user taps on any app cards displayed on various pages.
    AppsActivity
    This activity deals with the apps shown when "more" button on the Home Page is pressed.
    CategoriesActivity
    This activity shows all the categories.
    CategoriesView
    This activity shows all the apps which belong to a particular category.
    FlashActivity
    This activity deals with the Flash Card apps.
    FullScreenViewActivity
    This activity deals with showing a full screen image when an image in the screenshots gallery is selected.
    HomeActivity
    This class is the Home Page, which has a viewpager to display tabs for Store section and My-Apps section.
    InfoActivity
    This class deals with rendering Info-Type apps.
    InfoDetailActivity
    This class deals with showing meaning/description related to a particular word listed in the InfoActivity.
    NavigationActivity
    This class is the parent class to which almost all the activities extends to.
    QuestionActivity
    This activity renders Quiz related apps.
    ScoreActivity
    This activity shows the current score (total answered, unanswered and total wrong attempts) related to the current Quiz or Spellings Puzzle app.
    SettingsActivity
    This Activity extends to Preference Activity, and implements all the settings required by the app.
    SettingsActivity.AboutPreferenceFragment
    This fragment shows notification preferences only.
    SettingsActivity.GeneralPreferenceFragment
    This fragment shows general preferences only.
    SpellingActivity
    This activity renders the launched spellings puzzle app.
    SplashActivity
    Shows the splash screen and in the meanwhile, it download and renders the xml file.
    StartActivity
    This is the stating page, which is navigated to, when an app is launched.
    WordInfoActivity
    This class deals with displaying result for Spellings Puzzle apps.
